name: Draconic Magic
description: Your draconic aspect manifests as magical might.
benefit: You gain a group of spell-like abilities based on the color of your dragon aspect. Each spell-like ability can be used once per day, and the DC of any of these spelllike abilities is 10 + 1/2 your Hit Dice + Charisma modifier.
special: You can use this feat instead of Draconic Breath<sup>ARG</sup> or Draconic Glide<sup>ARG</sup> to qualify for the Draconic Paragon<sup>ARG</sup> feat. If you have this feat and Draconic Paragon, you can use the spell-like ability marked with a dagger (â€ ) twice per day.
